data.text: @CPHO_Canada I have in self imposed quarantine since the start of the pandemic due to a rare genetic disease. Why is a traditional inactivated vaccine with a traditional adjuvant not available in Canada?

@SpongeRobbie @CPHO_Canada Exactly! There's as much covid in CND as outside! Why not test before you jump on a bus in Toronto? Or on skytrain in VCV? The pre boarding testing doesn't make any sense anymore! Drop it!

@CPHO_Canada We need an explanation from you And how DARE you ever ever tell anyone to touch this poison again.  Start at page 30 and read nine pages of side effects that Pfizer wanted to hold back for 75 years  You had this information!!! https://t.co/t0NfnWmriZ

@CPHO_Canada Have you read any of the Pfizer research documents SCOTUS requested?  9 pages of “Safe and Effective” Adverse Side Affects, yet here you are still pushing toxic clot shot! Crimes Against Humanity.
@CPHO_Canada We need better guidance on boosters. We can not trust our province to supply the boosters when we need them.
